eduversum.name: wxMaxima
eduversum.description: Graphical interface for the maxima computer algebra system (CAS). Maxima is an Open-Source and a productive computer algebra system. Some functions and capabilities:[ul] [li]Solving equations and systems of equations[/li] [li]Determination of limits[/li] [li]Trigonometrical calculations[/li] [li]Manipulation of polynomials[/li] [li]Differentiating and solving differential equations of degree 1. and 2.[/li] [li]Integrating[/li] [li]Matrices[/li] [li]various applications of probability calculations[/li] [/ul] and much more. (wx)Maxima can represent graphically, 2 and 3 dimensional function graphs and can also print them. It also works with the function plotting program Gnuplot.
